title: Can anyone identify the Jamie Oliver Font please?
author: pepecat

comments.content:
This?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018014529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JO_6651.jpg)
  
That’s modified ITC Ronda.  
They are using it on the FIFTEEN-website as well.

Thanks Jan - thats the one - sorry my image link was broken, first time i've used this site and can't seem to get images to load probably. I did look at Ronda but was thown by the 'a'

Thanks again  
David

_I did look at Ronda but was thown by the ’a’_

That’s why I said ‘modified’. It’s a logo after all.  
But I’m pretty sure the rest is pure Ronda.
